message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a host of features that are sure to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $15000. However, I am willing to extend a special introductory offer to you. Would you consider purchasing this product for $14000? I trust that you will find its value far exceeding the investment.
